name: mcp-code-interpreter
description: Executes Python code within a persistent session, retaining past results (e.g., variables, imports). Similar to a Jupyter notebook. A session_id is returned on first use and must be included in subsequent requests to maintain context.

commands.name: execute_code
commands.description: Executes Python code within a persistent session, retaining past results (e.g., variables, imports). Similar to a Jupyter notebook. A session_id is returned on first use and must be included in subsequent requests to maintain context.
